attributes.action: Halt the inept politically motivated sale of Channel 4 by Nadine Dorries.
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has initiated the sell-of of Channel 4.
Nadine Dorries has given reasons for the sale, ALL of which have failed fact-checking. 
This sale is politically motivated and NOT in the public interest.
attributes.background: Force a vote on the sale of Channel 4 to ensure the process is open and fair, and may be rescinded.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop the privatisation of Channel 4: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995

Hold referendum on any privatisation of public service broadcasters: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614093
